text: Now Abessalom while yet alive had taken and set up for himself the pillar 18. 18 Gr. in, or by.near which he was taken, and set it up so as to have the pillar in the king's dale; for he said he had no son to keep his name in remembrance: 18. 18 Heb. and Alex. insert 'and he called the pillar after his own name.'and he called the pillar, Abessalom's 18. 18 Heb. idiom for 'place.'hand, until this day.
